resources.string: More than 8 years of managerial and administrative experience provided me with the ability to work in teams and moulded me into an entrepreneur. Throughout my education I gained knowledge for managing services industry, project planning and business development. Looking for a position to further polish my skills and build on my experience.

Completed the first year by passing the exams in Computer Fundamentals, Computational Thinking and Problem-Solving, Interpersonal Skills for IT, UX/UI Design and Usability, Programming Essentials, Management Information Systems, Networking Technologies, Mathematics, and Software-Defined Computing. Gaining all the necessary skills to work in software development, computer programming, cyber-security, and computer networks settings.
BACHELOR’S DEGREE: PRODUCTION OF GOODS AND SERVICES
Completed a technical program focused on physics, mathematics, computer science, goods production and management, as well as operational logistics.

The specialization covers interactive programming in Python, principles of computing, and algorithmic thinking. Upon completion, will be able to carry out object-oriented programming (OOP), understand algorithms, and be familiar with graph theory and tree data structure.
CERTIFICATE: SWITCHING, ROUTING, AND WIRELESS ESSENTIALS
Acquiring skills needed to configure and troubleshoot VLANs, Wireless LANs, and Inter-VLAN routing and troubleshoot redundancy on a switched network using STP and EtherChannel.
Gaining an understanding of how Linux is used and mastering Linux commands.
Able to build simple LANs, perform basic configurations for routers and switches, and implement IPv4 and IPv6 addressing schemes while adhering to security best practices.
